item.title: Project 1: Using Machine Learning predict Vietnam stock market
item.description: Project 1: Using Machine Learning predict Vietnam stock market Investpy, BeautifulSoup để Crawling Data Pandas, Numpy để Preprocessing Data, dùng Datetime + RSI indicator để lọc Stocks Matplotlib để Visualization Data Machine Learning: Time Series prediction: ARIMA, Prophet (Facebook Library) Open, Close price: Unsupervised Learning (LinearRegression, DecisionTreeRegressor, RandomForestRegressor, AdaBoostRegressor, …) This Project’s GitHub Repository
